alert.note: Alert for Sedgwick; Sumner (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 7:14PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Sedgwick and northwestern Sumner Counties through 800 PM CDT... At 714 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Viola, or near Clearwater, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Wichita, Haysville, Wellington, Goddard, Clearwater, Conway Springs, Argonia, Viola, Eisenhower National Airport, South Wichita, Mayfield, Milan, Oaklawn, Lake Afton, Riverdale and Wellington Airport. This includes the following highways... Interstate 135 between Mile Markers 0 and 4. Interstate 35 between Mile Markers 27 and 45. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
